author: __lithp__
content: Absolutely, I have ~500 lines of go in a script which traces block execution using turbogeth, and another ~60 lines of python to analyze the results. I'll share them this week!

author: pipermerriam
content: Nice analysis.  Will be good to get the results validated for correctness.  It doesn't mean very much but, I think this lines up with my "gut".  It'd be nice to ratchet this up to a million blocks or so to see how the long tail behaves.  Same with just having a list of block numbers and the "oldest" state touched in each.
